entry.title: When love blossoms
entry.summary:
Author: Trialbyname

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 71,000Chapters: 44/51Kudos: 299

Summary: "I command you again," Sir Leon let out, "Show yourselves!"Arthur rose first, his movements slow and careful. Merlin, after having gotten over the initial surprise, mirrored Arthurs movements, rising from his spot with both hands over his head. And he got to take in the ever so glorious sight of the four knights, looking between the two of them in pure confusion."I am truly sorry if we were a bother to you, sir knight." Arthur let out, a small tone of mockery in his voice."How-how is this...?" Gwaine let out, "How is this possible?"---Once upon a time, a choice was made. A choice that would have held consequences for the kingdom of Camelot, and everyone who lived there, had it gone through. But it didn't.But now, Merlin and Arthur find themselves in an alternate universe where it did.

entry.title: Just Go With It
entry.summary:
Author: perksofimmortality (akahomie)

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,178Chapters: 2/2Kudos: 22

Summary: “Merlin,” Arthur said without preamble, in a voice that sounds like he’s trying way too hard to keep it casual, level, and not preemptively guilty. This triggers Merlin’s fight-or-flight response immediately—because nothing good ever comes out of Arthur’s mouth whenever he uses that voice. “What do I have to give for you to be my fake boyfriend for six weeks?”

entry.title: Lines in the Sand
entry.summary:
Author: PapySanzo

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 36,167Chapters: 9/25Kudos: 321

Summary: In the icy streets of Camelot City, a homeless Merlin struggles to survive after escaping an abusive relationship. When a chance encounter brings him face-to-face with Arthur Pendragon, the real estate billionaire owning half of Albion, Merlin is thrown a lifeline in the form of a job. But Pendragon’s offer is for sex work: a position as his 24/7 live-in sub. More than reluctant, but desperate for shelter, Merlin agrees, and soon finds himself struggling as past traumas resurface…

entry.title: The Sorcerer Who Was Her
entry.summary:
Author: SChryslerS

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 48,331Chapters: 27/?Kudos: 445

Summary: The great and wise sorcerer, the closest confidant and most trusted ally of King Arthur, was born a girl. This single truth changes nothing—his wisdom remains boundless, his power undiminished, his destiny unshaken. And yet, it changes everything, for within this paradox lies a secret, a force beyond mere magic, one that reshapes not only his own fate but the fate of the world itself.

entry.summary:
Author: excalibursflame

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,101Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 18

entry.title: Bringer of Light, Darkness, Magic, and All Things Inbetween
entry.summary:
Author: witerwallyanerd

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,890Chapters: 3/20Kudos: 7

Summary: My first fic guys! Say hello to god Merlin, sad Merlin, hurt Arthur, and really confused everyone else!-witerwallyanerdMerlin had been living a lie since he knew what one was. Ealdor lied in the border of Cenred’s kingdom and Camelot, and was much more tolerant of magic than Camelot was.Even so, you could only show so much ability before people got suspicious.So in Ealdor, it had always been playing down his abilities. He never imagined he was going to be hiding them completely. Merlin lived by Gaius’ rules, most of the time. Half the time. Whenever they didn’t get in his way, if he was being honest.However, recently, his magic had been itchy, for lack of better words. He felt it under his skin, in his veins, his hair. Heard it in every breath he breathed, every word that came from his mouth.

entry.title: Of Nonchanters and Sorcerers
entry.summary:
Author: Electric_Dream

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 34,413Chapters: 13/?Kudos: 116

Summary: Sequel to Of Sorcerers and Nonchanters BBC Merlin but not like you know it.A role reversal.What if not having magic was illegal?What if Merlin was the prince instead of Arthur?What if Arthur was Merlin’s manservant?How would all of this change the story that we all know and love.*** Mordred had gotten what he had wanted.He had spread his hatred, his death and his destruction, killing and tearing down those that were in his way to the throne. He had slain countless of innocents including Ygraine, a loss that lay heavy inside of Arthur’s chest. He was barely holding on since his return to the world of the living he was sure that soon he was going to break. However, he was not going to let anyone see, he had to be strong, he had to be stoic and he had to be brave. He was Arthur Pendragon, the supposed King of a broken kingdom and supposed king of a dying race. The weight was on his shoulders and he did not have time to stop and think. If he did that, he probably will never return to his feet again. At least not whole..There was a great fight ahead of them that they were going to have to be ready for.No matter what.

entry.title: Of Mice and Kings
entry.summary:
Author: MyAmisFics

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,968Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 61

Summary: Morgana transforms Arthur into a small mouse in a fit of rage. As a mouse, Arthur must now find his way back to Camelot and his friends, in the hope that they can help him. Thankfully, he has a manservant who adores small animals.- - - - - - - -“Hello, little one!” Merlin used the same high-pitched voice that he usually used on babies and kittens. Arthur would never admit that he found it adorable. He lifted his hands to get a closer look at Arthur, who found it strange to be so close to his face. Merlin smiled at him and gently stroked his back with one long finger.And so the day went by, with Merlin believing the King was off with his knights, and the knights believing he was in the armory with Merlin. No one would notice that their King was missing until dinner time, or even late evening depending on their schedules.- - - - - - - - -

entry.title: Whereabouts of the Heart
entry.summary:
Author: perksofimmortality (akahomie)

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 28,869Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 5

Summary: A Merlin parody of The Swan Princess (+ some Brave & Anastasia mixed in, too)As an act of goodwill following a successful peace treaty with Camelot, the leaders of the Dragonrider Clan offer High Dragonlord Balinor’s firstborn child to be the future betrothed of Uther Pendragon’s young son, the two-year-old Prince Arthur. Half a year later, when Lady Hunith gives birth to a baby boy, little Merlin is welcomed with open arms by both peoples.Now eleven and nine years old respectively, Arthur and Merlin are formally introduced for the first time, and it goes about as well as you’d expect (which is to say not at all). But no worries, they still have a decade to grow to like each other enough for the engagement to proceed without any problems. That’s a lot of time to fall in love... so it’s practically a done deal. Right?

entry.title: Queen Merlin
entry.summary:
Author: Sorcha2003

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 169,549Chapters: 70/?Kudos: 817

Summary: Prince Arthur Pendragon, always had something dark inside him, and he made his hatred clear to everyone. But it turns out that everything changed, when he found a little wizard named Merlin in the forest. Arthur never thought he could feel love, but when he saw Merlin he knew he must be his. So, watch their adventure while maintaining their love relationship. All this, hiding Merlin's magic from King Uther, while Arthur makes it clear that Merlin belongs to him.
